extension.description: RuposTel User Registration forensic logging plugin. See how spambots register at your site, make sure this plugin is used with care since you do not want to store passwords in clear text or credit card information! This plugin sends an email to store vendor about the current state of REQUEST variable including POST during the registration process.

field.name: filter_words
field.label: Filter REQUEST variables separated by comma without space
field.description: Input filter variables separated by comma which you do not want to log. Default: password,password2,opc_password,cc_number,cc_num
